sentences.en: Critics say the show uninspired and boring.
sentences.cn: 批评者说,晚会了无生气、令人生厌.

sentences.en: Even though he was a petty - bourgeois writer, ghastly, uninspired, who only wrote for a petty - bourgeois readership.
sentences.cn: 即使他是个小资作家, 苍白的, 缺乏创见的, 他只能为那些小资读者们写作.

sentences.en: Food in the dining car was adequate, if uninspired.
sentences.cn: 餐车里的食品虽然量足够多，但花样太少。

sentences.en: GM's product line has been criticized by some analysts as uninspired.
sentences.cn: 在此以前,分析家曾经批评通用的产品缺乏设计灵感.

sentences.en: I was going home and I thought I'd feel uninspired to write.
sentences.cn: 我是回家,突然觉得我创作的很平庸.

sentences.en: I was left a little uninspired with his overall display although his flicks were magical.
sentences.cn: 虽然他的电影充满魔术般的变幻,但我认为他的总体表演缺乏创意.

sentences.en: Inspired, he worked in a white heat of creative energy , uninspired, he worked not at all.
sentences.cn: 灵感来时, 他极度兴奋地写作,创造力源源涌至; 缺乏灵感时, 他干脆搁笔.

sentences.en: She can't wait to sell her next violent, uninspired movie in China.
sentences.cn: 她等不及要在中国卖她的下一部暴力的 、 单调的电影.

sentences.en: The division had been stagnating under uninspired leadership.
sentences.cn: 由于领导人庸庸碌碌,该部门一直处于停滞状态.

sentences.en: The production was professional but uninspired.
sentences.cn: 演出很专业,但缺乏灵感.

sentences.en: The world is too unpredictable, too volatile, too fast - moving for such an uninspired approach.
sentences.cn: 世界的发展难以预见, 变化无常,一日千里, 这样平庸的管理方法已经跟不上形势了.

sentences.en: There was no one who was uninspired.
They would have been heavy and uninspired and inclined to hate.
sentences.cn: 她们将会感到忧闷阴郁,平淡乏味,动辄怨天尤人了.

words.tran_cn: 无灵感的；缺乏创见的；平凡的

trans.tran_cn: 无想像力的，无灵感的，枯燥的
